title: Blinding Salvation
description: Armand von Kassel only had fury as his companion for decades. Trapped in the dungeon of his own castle by his sworn enemies, the once powerful vampire was near starvation as he waited for his next blood source. Kidnapped, drugged, and thrown into what she thinks is a wild animalâ€™s cage, Lily Lewis waits to be ripped apart. Born centuries apart, can the unlikely duo work together to save each other or will Armand lose control and drink the captivating beauty dry?
author: Livia Bourne
